message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
Let's meet in the middle, Alice. We both get a good share.
The tides are turning, Bob. Inflation is working against you. Take this offer before it's too late!
I'm still willing to compromise. Don't think inflation will scare me off that easily!
This is my final offer, Bob. You're losing ground with every passing round. Take it or leave it!
